SEARCH
Package seng201.team25.services

Class WindowManager

java.lang.Object
seng201.team25.services.WindowManager
public class WindowManager extends Object
Used to control movement between game screens using the same JavaFX window.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WindowManager(Consumer<WindowManager> homeScreenLauncher, Consumer<WindowManager> setupScreenLauncher, Consumer<WindowManager> towerScreenLauncher, Consumer<WindowManager> gameScreenLauncher, Runnable clearScreen)
    Constructor to allow various screen launchers to be defined

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    launchHomeScreen()
    Launches the home screen without clearing.
    void

    Clears the existing screen, then launches the main game screen.

    Clears the existing screen, then launches the home screen.
    void
    toSetupScreen()
    Clears the existing screen, then launches the setup screen.
    void
    toTowerScreen()

  • Method Details

    • launchHomeScreen

      public void launchHomeScreen()
      Launches the home screen without clearing. Used when no screen is already loaded.

    • toHomeScreen

      public void toHomeScreen()
      Clears the existing screen, then launches the home screen. Used when another screen is already loaded.

    • toSetupScreen

      public void toSetupScreen()
      Clears the existing screen, then launches the setup screen.

    • toTowerScreen

      public void toTowerScreen()
      Clears the existing screen, then launches the tower selection screen.

    • toGameScreen

      public void toGameScreen()
      Clears the existing screen, then launches the main game screen.
